settings.title: Industry Standards & Compliance
settings.subtitle: Comprehensive guide to amusement industry safety standards

settings.content: Stay current with the latest safety standards, regulations, and compliance requirements from leading industry organizations worldwide.

settings.title: ASTM Standards
settings.content:
• F24.10.03 - Inspection of Amusement Rides
  • F24.10.01 - Quality Assurance
  • F24.61.02 - Patron Safety Systems

settings.title: International Standards
settings.content:
• EN 13814 - European Safety Standards
  • CSA Z267 - Canadian Standards
  • AS 3533 - Australian Standards
  • JIS A 8701 - Japanese Safety Standards

settings.title: Regulatory Bodies
settings.content:
• CPSC - Consumer Product Safety Commission
  • OSHA - Occupational Safety Standards
  • State Regulatory Authorities
  • Local Jurisdiction Requirements
